name: Addiemall
description: A online and mobile advertising portal
overview: A online and mobile advertising portal for women and startups. Addiemall provides attractive low price advertising in online and mobile spaces exclusively to women and other startups aimed at vital economies like India and USA.Interms of online advertising, We offer two services to the client at the same time. Firstly, We gurantee them that their promotions will be put up in leading online webspaces like google,yahoo,facebook,bing,and other sites that abide by “Clickable”(we are subcontracters of clickable) .Secondly we also let them be found in the search results of these sites.We are also in the process of providing SEO services to our clients. As for Mobile advertising is concerned, We do your promotions in the form of Text messages to a particular target of audiences who are likely to be most influenced by the clients business at very low prices, which no business would afford to miss.
